import React, { useState } from 'react' import { useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import { dataHubType } from '../../Types/types'; import Hero from './Hero' import HomeNav from './HomeNav' const Home = () => { const dataHub:dataHubType=useSelector((state:dataHubType)=>state) let [products,setProducts]=useState(dataHub.products) return ( <>
{ products.map(x=>
{x.title}

{x.description}

) }
) }; export default Home
